decisions.reasoning: Adding another agent increases complexity and costs without clear ROI. Proposals 1 and 2 should reduce conflicts by 70% and 50% respectively - that's already 85%+ improvement. If those don't work, then consider this agent. Also, pattern-matching auto-fixes could introduce subtle bugs.
